Text:
"When eating a fruit, think of the person who planted the tree" 

Thanks a ton rkstr {O__O}
THANK YOU SO SO MUCH. I LOVE YOU.
'Tis a keen point ye get, Zarabol - but I be puzzled by who ye mean... twas rkstr who brung me th' fruit, eveniffa (s)he dinna plant th' tree, and I thank most heartily!
are you calling me a fruit? :-)
Ye be whut ye be, ser - taint no mind o' mine!  Me simple mind's got a taste for semantics, 'tis all...  :D
Thank you for offering this program, much appreciated.
Thank you sooo much for all your Project Runway uploads... very very much appreciated!!!
Thanks so much, rkstr - you really are a star of rock..
when it's the next one coming? thanks again!
Thank you so much for posting the show! Now where is episode 3? :)
I will upload the next episode when i have it! Demanding it will have the opposite effect of what you're hoping for.
